DataElement.preferredName: Male Patient Contribution Creation Offspring Occurrence Yes No Unk Previous Report Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indicator that describes whether or not the male patient contributed to the creation of offspring or if it was previously reported.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Male Patient Contribution Creation Offspring Occurrence
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who belongs to the sex that normally produces sperm. The term is used to indicate biological sex distinctions, cultural gender role distinctions, or both._A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._The part played by somebody or something in bringing about an end or result._The process by which something is brought into existence; having been brought into existence._A human descendant (son or daughter) of any age._An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who belongs to the sex that normally produces sperm. The term is used to indicate biological sex distinctions, cultural gender role distinctions, or both.:A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.:The part played by somebody or something in bringing about an end or result.:The process by which something is brought into existence; having been brought into existence.:A human descendant (son or daughter) of any age.

Concepts.definition: A person who belongs to the sex that normally produces sperm. The term is used to indicate biological sex distinctions, cultural gender role distinctions, or both.
A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.
The part played by somebody or something in bringing about an end or result.
The process by which something is brought into existence; having been brought into existence.
A first-generation, biological descendant of any age.

Property.preferredDefinition: Occurrence; an instance of something happening.

Concepts.definition: An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the patient's ability to conceive or nurse offspring and/or their current reproductive status.
